tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents (
  incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_occurred DATE NOT NULL,
  number_of_injuries INT,
  number_of_fatalities INT
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_accidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    accident_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    is_fatal BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE accident_details (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  vehicle_involved VARCHAR(50),
  severity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES traffic_incidents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficIncidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    reported_time TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AccidentReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_time TIME,
    reported_by VARCHAR(100),
    report_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES TrafficIncidents(incident_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Personnel (
    personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentResponse (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    personnel_id INT,
    response_time TIMESTAMP,
    response_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES TrafficIncidents(incident_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (personnel_id) REFERENCES Personnel(personnel_id)
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	incident_type VARCHAR(50),
	location VARCHAR(100),
	date TIMESTAMP,
	description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE accidents (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	driver_name VARCHAR(50),
	vehicle_plate VARCHAR(20),
	location VARCHAR(100),
	date TIMESTAMP,
	description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE personnel (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50),
	rank VARCHAR(20),
	department VARCHAR(50),
	contact VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vehicle_make VARCHAR(50),
	vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
	license_plate VARCHAR(20),
	owner_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50),
	head VARCHAR(50),
	location VARCHAR(100),
	contact VARCHAR(15)
)
